name: Ballfrog Pinball
description:
Use your gun to aim and space bar to  shoot Jerimiah to the very top of of this cruel world of tumbleweed and waterless deserts. Only then will he bring joy to the world.  

Left Arrow and Right keys activate the paddles to help him get higher and higher to his destiny. A delicious western bacon chesseburger with bbq sauce and onion rings!

song :

Strut Your Stuff
By: christianmaucery
